attributes.action: Get the BBC to use part adds and maybe charge the public just a small donation of £25 per year to help find a cure for cancer..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The year is 2008 and we still haven't got a cure for this! The BBC could use the money from the ads to fund its staff and we "the public" would not mind paying a small fee a year towards a chosen charity of our choice.. just say we all pay £25 thats nothing to us but a HUGH help to other people

We have cancer research still needing help

We have the RSPCA who need our help

We have people with AIDS HIV who need our help

Plus many many more !

Let's put Britain back on the map as a good place and not just taxed to high heaven!


Scrap the tv licence USE them ADS, not only does it help out the poorer public it also helps out HUGE companies

BUT MOST OF ALL IT WILL HELP HUMANITY

Why charge £150 for our tv licence when theres big companiess willing to pay it for us!

You know in a way it makes sense..


Sign my petition......

Thanks

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
